attributes.action: stand up for Britain against countries willing to negotiate through detainment of our citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iran has falsely seized our citizens’ and are in breach of humanitarian laws.   Britain must send a firm message to the World now and for the future that we will not stand nor tolerate such behaviour and take such action as is necessary, immediately to have our people returned back home to their families.  Now is a time for us as a country to support any actions of our Government in this crises.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
